basics.label: Senior DevSecOps Engineer
basics.summary: Infrastructure engineer with **17+ years of experience**, evolving from **Linux administration** to Lead DevOps and **DevSecOps**. Deep expertise in **AWS** and **Terraform**, with a strong focus on **cloud security** and automation. Led the initiative to achieve **SOC2 compliance** on the first audit. I enjoy solving complex architectural challenges and mentoring teams to deliver their best work.
